mapper.select: SELECT SUM(N.KCAL * E.AMOUNT) AS KCAL, SUM(N.CARBOHYDRATE * E.AMOUNT) AS CARBOHYDRATE, SUM(N.PROTEIN * E.AMOUNT) AS PROTEIN, SUM(N.FAT * E.AMOUNT) AS FAT, SUM(N.SUGARS * E.AMOUNT) AS SUGARS FROM EAT E, NUTRIENT N WHERE E.CODE = N.CODE AND E.REG_DT BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{startDate},'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AND TO_DATE(#{finishDate},'YY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS') AND E.ID = #{userId}

SELECT SUM(N.KCAL * E.AMOUNT) AS KCAL, SUM(N.CARBOHYDRATE * E.AMOUNT) AS CARBOHYDRATE, SUM(N.PROTEIN * E.AMOUNT) AS PROTEIN, SUM(N.FAT * E.AMOUNT) AS FAT, SUM(N.SUGARS * E.AMOUNT) AS SUGARS FROM EAT E, NUTRIENT N WHERE E.CODE = N.CODE AND TO_CHAR(E.reg_dt, 'YY/MM/DD') = #{formatedNow} AND E.ID = #{userId}

SELECT A.*,B.totalCnt FROM ( SELECT tt1.code, tt1.name, tt1.kcal, tt1.carbohydrate, tt1.protein, tt1.fat, tt1.sugars FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rnum, T1.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM nutrient WHERE name LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' ORDER BY name ASC )T1 WHERE ROWNUM <=#{pageSize} * (#{pageNo}-1) + #{pageSize} )TT1 WHERE rnum >= #{pageSize} * (#{pageNo}-1) + 1 )A CROSS JOIN ( SELECT COUNT(*) totalCnt FROM nutrient WHERE name LIKE '%' || #{searchWord} || '%' )B
